      • shiftReservation

        public void shiftReservation​(int numRoom,
                             java.lang.String roomtype,
                             int delta)
        this method will shift the reservation list to have add more "waitlist" (delta =-1) or add more "confirmed" (delta = 1) depending on delta
        Parameters:
        num_room - number of available rooms in certain roomtype (updated information)
        roomtype -
        delta - delta is the number of rooms to be changed to "vacant" or "under maintainance"
